section.title: Deadline
section.para: The deadline filter lets a message pass until a certain deadline is reached. If the deadline has passed the message will be discarded.

note.simpara: This is a hypothetical filter type to show off filter possibilities in combination with other filter types.

listitem.simpara: deadline.read; when the deadline passed: message.discard

tr.td: The deadline to check for. When it's not present it will read the deadline property set in the message. If the message does not have a deadline property nothing will be done.

The exception type to throw when the deadline has passed when this filter is evaluated. When this argument is not set no exception will be thrown. When the argument could not be resolved to a valid exception no exception is thrown and an error will be logged.
The message property where the deadline is stored. Defaults to 'deadline'.
